Keywords: Armor , New Mutants , S.W.O.R.D. , X-Men
Real Name: Hisako Ichiki
Special Powers
RALLY (5): Opposing Attack Rolls . When an adjacent friendly character would take damage from an attack, you may remove one of Armor's RALLY dice. If you do, that character takes no damage from the attack and after resolutions deal Armor 1 unavoidable damage.
EXPANDABLE ARMOR: Blades/Claws/Fangs, Super Strength, Quake.
PSIONIC EXOSKELETON-ARMOR: Defend, Energy Shield/Deflection, Invulnerability. // Adjacent friendly character can use Toughness.
I AM THE SHIELD: Colossal damage symbol.
